fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Little flying booms that are safe for any age.

big_cracker.name: Big Cracker
big_cracker.description: This thing makes a nice bright flower in the sky.

red_dragon.name: Red Dragon
red_dragon.description: For professional use only. Created by Gandalf the Grey.

purple_craze.name: Purple Craze
purple_craze.description: Hundreds of purple Junebugs in the sky. For professional use only.

fire_cracker.name: Fire Cracker
fire_cracker.description: Sid's special weapon to explode action figures.

gun_powder.name: Gun Powder
gun_powder.description: Used by Daniel Boon to kill raccoons.

dihydrogen_oxide.name: Dihydrogen Oxide
dihydrogen_oxide.description: Very little boom here. Safe for any age. Just add CO2 and shake.

pipe_bomb.name: Pipe Bomb
pipe_bomb.description: Can be devastating. For use by hillbilly fishermen.

magnesium_sulfate.name: Magnesium Sulfate
magnesium_sulfate.description: Not sure what this does. Moderate boom.

manganese_iodide.name: Manganese Iodide
manganese_iodide.description: Moderate boom. Great for removing tree stumps.

super_explosion.name: Super Explosion
super_explosion.description: Remove buildings with ease. Professional use only.

mass_extinction.name: Mass Extinction
mass_extinction.description: Remove all life on earth. God use only.

chernobyl.name: Chernobyl
chernobyl.description: Remove part of a country. Great for use by inexperienced professionals.
